You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesM M] > &mscr;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Mscr;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2133/index.htm U+02133].
  * `&mscr;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D4C2.
